body: It looks like a Grasshopper/RhinoCommon bug to me. For some reason Grasshopper thinks center point of your first box is not inside the box! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lihD20i2jryyL6mpD7m8fwEXEeuQ9oKkqvJRY3QU3dL-zGpzOsLxA-DgrRsxOBnCQJrPwp0VHi0rCe5mboeoCI0deno4jP0Y/isCenterPtInside.png) I reported this bug while ago and nobody ever replied ([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/bug-inclusiontest-fails-i...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/bug-inclusiontest-fails-in-rhinocommon-and-grasshopper)). You may want to refresh the post. There is also a chance that I'm making an obvious mistake!
